description:
The OUTpulse Mid Light Trail Shoes have a waterproof-breathable upper to keep your feet dry in sudden rainstorms or unexpected creek crossings. Mid-height supports the ankle and provides protection from trail debris, and the highly durable rubber sole keeps you upright through loose or wet patches.

  • Seamless synthetic uppers have welded overlays for durability
  • Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® booties let you tackle wet conditions
  • Protective synthetic toe cap
  • Sensifit™ construction provides a precise, secure fit
  • Gusseted tongues keep debris out
  • Removable OrthoLite® EVA footbeds cushion feet for long days on the trail
  • Injected EVA midsoles make 15km hikes feel like 5km
  • Outsoles are non-marking Contagrip® rubber
  • 5mm lugs provide traction over a variety of directions and surfaces
name: Salomon OUTpulse Mid Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Men's
